overview: D.O. is wandering around in the dark streets of New York when he spots Rafael Alencar, the man of his dreams. He follows Rafael into a mysterious house - is it a dream or reality? He wanders thru smokey and shadowy dark rooms till he walks into a bright white room. There he sees Mason Wyler lying on a white daybed sucking on Rafael's gigantic cock. Mason swallows the entire tool to its base without even a flinch. Rafael pumps his massive manhood into Mason's mouth over and over again, then flips him over and shoves it up his his hungry tight ass, causing Mason to screams with pain/pleasure.
title: Obsession of D.O.
